description: Identify the city with the highest number of community gardens per 10,000 residents.
Calculate the average number of community gardens per 10,000 residents across all listed cities.
Determine the number of cities that have more than 3 community gardens per 10,000 residents.
List the cities in descending order based on the number of community gardens per 10,000 residents.
Identify any cities that have an exceptionally high or low number of community gardens compared to the others.
Find the range of the number of community gardens per 10,000 residents across all cities.
What is the number of community gardens per 10,000 residents for Washington, DC?
Determine if there is a correlation between the city size and the number of community gardens per 10,000 residents.
Compute the total number of community gardens per 10,000 residents for the top 3 cities.
How many cities have a similar number of community gardens per 10,000 residents?
